oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Contractors work to rebuild Lesli Bills’s Pennington Bend home after a gas explosion destroyed the home during the May 2010 flood
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
A photograph of contractors working to rebuild Lesli Bills’s Pennington Bend home after flooding caused a gas explosion during the May 2010 flood. Lesli Bills and her friend Billy Heldenberg were rescued by a man on a jetski shortly before Lesli’s home exploded.
Forms part of the Nashville Room Flood 2010 Digital History Project.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Flood damage;Natural disasters--Nashville (Tenn.);Floods;Fires
